title: Looking For A Ranked Team (Silver 5)
body: Just looking for a nice active ranked team which has a lot of fun but takes their games a fair bit seriously. I would prefer if the team had a way of communicaton so we can practice and hopefully make better plays. IGN:DatSexyAsian

replies.body:
Hi i main anywhere and am interested in getting a ranked team together 
i am in b4 becoz of promos but was s3 been playing lol fot about 8 months
i am 16 and male 
my summoner name is CCCprodigy
I use skype,Curse

Hi,
I main support and am also interested in getting a serious ranked team together. I have joined a lot of ranked teams... but no one ever wants to actually play. Add me if you are interested in having me on your team.
I am currently silver 4, i have only been playing league for about 6 months, so any and all advice welcome. I am currently trying to learn other roles as well
Main champions i play: Morgana, nami, janna, leona, soraka
I am 20 and also female.... (hope that's not a problem :p)
I prefer to play if there is some form of verbal communication: ts3, mumble, skype, curse, etc...
my summoner name is: Mistress Athena .... add me if you want to play ^_^
Thank you for your time ^_^
I will add you. sorry for the 3 day delay. forgot to check boards lol

hey im a bronze one that mains top and my back up is adc iv been looking for a team for a while i'm usually on all the time. i dont mind using or downloading anything for communication. i already have Skype and curse
